abstract: Italian judge continues the house arrest of Francesco Schettino, the captain of the luxury liner that ran aground off the Tuscan coast, rejecting both the prosecutors' request to imprison him and the request of his lawyer to have him released. (M)9
lead_paragraph: FLORENCE, Italy -- A judge in Florence continued on Tuesday the house arrest of Francesco Schettino, the captain of the luxury liner that ran aground off the Tuscan coast on Jan. 13, leaving 17 people dead and 15 still unaccounted for. Amid a highly heated public debate in Italy about the shipwreck of the liner, the Costa Concordia, a Florence appeals court rejected both the prosecutors' request to imprison the captain and the request of Captain Schettino's lawyer to have him released.
